## Notes

-   Data source: `AustralianWines.csv`
-   App follows Week 5 workflow: load → wrangle → split → model → forecast → evaluate → visualize.

```{r}
#| message: false
library(shiny)
library(shinythemes)
library(rsconnect)
library(tidyverse)
library(tsibble)
library(fable)
library(fabletools)
library(feasts)
library(lubridate)
library(stringr)
```

```{r}
#| global: true
wine_ts <- wine_raw |>
  mutate(
    Month = yearmonth(Month, format = "%b-%y")
  ) |>
  # 2. If the year is 2000+, subtract 100 to fix 2080 -> 1980, etc.
  mutate(
    yr   = year(Month),
    mon  = month(Month),
    yr   = if_else(yr >= 2000, yr - 100L, yr),
    Month = yearmonth(sprintf("%d-%02d", yr, mon))
  ) |>
  select(-yr, -mon) |>
  # 3. Clean numeric columns
  mutate(
    across(
      -Month,
      ~ .x |>
        as.character() |>
        str_replace_all(",", "") |>
        str_replace_all("[^0-9.]", "") |>
        na_if("") |>
        as.numeric()
    )
  ) |>
  pivot_longer(
    cols      = -Month,
    names_to  = "Varietal",
    values_to = "Sales"
  ) |>
  filter(!is.na(Sales)) |>                 # <--- drop missing sales
  as_tsibble(index = Month, key = Varietal) |>
  arrange(Varietal, Month)

# Helper values for UI controls
min_month <- min(wine_ts$Month, na.rm = TRUE)
max_month <- max(wine_ts$Month, na.rm = TRUE)

min_date <- as.Date(min_month)
max_date <- as.Date(max_month)

year_choices  <- year(min_date):year(max_date)
month_choices <- month.abb

varietal_choices <- wine_ts |>
  distinct(Varietal) |>
  arrange(Varietal) |>
  pull(Varietal)
```

```{r}
ui <- fluidPage(
  theme = shinytheme("flatly"),
  titlePanel("Australian Wine Sales Forecasting by Varietal"),
  
  sidebarLayout(
    sidebarPanel(
      width = 3,

      # Select varietal(s)
      selectInput(
        "varietal",
        "Select varietal(s):",
        choices  = varietal_choices,
        selected = "Red",
        multiple = TRUE
      ),

      # Date range - safe dropdown method
      selectInput(
        "start_year",
        "Start year:",
        choices  = year_choices,
        selected = year(min_date)
      ),
      selectInput(
        "start_month",
        "Start month:",
        choices  = month_choices,
        selected = "Jan"
      ),

      selectInput(
        "end_year",
        "End year:",
        choices  = year_choices,
        selected = year(max_date)
      ),
      selectInput(
        "end_month",
        "End month:",
        choices  = month_choices,
        selected = "Dec"
      ),

      # Training end year (safe numeric slider)
      sliderInput(
        "train_end_year",
        "Training end year:",
        min   = year(min_date),
        max   = year(max_date) - 1,
        value = year(max_date) - 2,
        step  = 1
      ),

      # Forecast horizon
      numericInput(
        "h",
        "Forecast horizon (months):",
        value = 12,
        min = 1,
        max = 60
      ),

      checkboxInput(
        "show_decomp",
        "Show STL decomposition",
        value = FALSE
      )
    ),

    # ----------------------------------------------------------
    # MAIN PANEL
    # ----------------------------------------------------------
    mainPanel(
      width = 9,
      tabsetPanel(

        # Overview Tab
        tabPanel(
          "Overview",
          plotOutput("ts_plot"),
          br(),
          conditionalPanel(
            "input.show_decomp == true",
            plotOutput("decomp_plot")
          )
        ),

        # Forecasts Tab
        tabPanel(
          "Forecasts",
          plotOutput("fc_plot")
        ),

        # Accuracy & Specs Tab
        tabPanel(
          "Accuracy & Specs",
          h4("Training accuracy"),
          tableOutput("train_accuracy_table"),
          br(),
          h4("Validation accuracy"),
          tableOutput("valid_accuracy_table"),
          br(),
          h4("Model specifications"),
          tableOutput("model_specs_table")
        )
      )
    )
  )
)
```

```{r}
#-----------------------------------------------------------------------
# SERVER
#-----------------------------------------------------------------------

server <- function(input, output, session) {

  #---------------------------------------------------
  # Helper: build clamped Dates from dropdowns
  #---------------------------------------------------
  date_range_selected <- reactive({
    start_date <- make_date(
      year  = as.integer(input$start_year),
      month = match(input$start_month, month.abb),
      day   = 1
    )
    end_date <- make_date(
      year  = as.integer(input$end_year),
      month = match(input$end_month, month.abb),
      day   = 1
    )

    # clamp to data range
    start_date <- max(start_date, min_date)
    end_date   <- min(end_date,   max_date)

    list(start = start_date, end = end_date)
  })

  #---------------------------------------------------
  # Filter data by varietal and date range
  #---------------------------------------------------
  data_filtered <- reactive({
    req(input$varietal)

    dr <- date_range_selected()
    start_date <- dr$start
    end_date   <- dr$end

    df <- wine_ts |>
      filter(
        Varietal %in% input$varietal,
        as.Date(Month) >= start_date,
        as.Date(Month) <= end_date
      )

    validate(
      need(
        nrow(df) > 0,
        "No data in this date range. Try widening the window or changing varietal."
      )
    )

    df
  })

  #---------------------------------------------------
  # Train / validation split (by training-end YEAR)
  #---------------------------------------------------
  train_validation <- reactive({
    df <- data_filtered()

    # build training-end date (December of selected year)
    te_year <- as.integer(input$train_end_year)
    te_year <- min(max(te_year, year(min_date)), year(max_date))
    train_end_date <- make_date(te_year, 12, 1)

    train <- df |>
      filter(as.Date(Month) <= train_end_date)

    val <- df |>
      filter(as.Date(Month) > train_end_date)

    list(train = train, validation = val)
  })

  #---------------------------------------------------
  # Fit models: TSLM, ETS, ARIMA
  #---------------------------------------------------
  models <- reactive({
    tv    <- train_validation()
    train <- tv$train

    validate(
      need(
        nrow(train) >= 24,
        "Not enough training data to fit the models. Move the training end earlier."
      )
    )

    train |>
      model(
        TSLM  = TSLM(Sales ~ trend() + season()),
        ETS   = ETS(Sales),
        # manual, stable ARIMA model that will fit
        ARIMA = ARIMA(Sales ~ pdq(0,1,1) + PDQ(0,1,1))
      )
  })

  #---------------------------------------------------
  # Forecasts for user-chosen horizon h
  #---------------------------------------------------
  fc_future <- reactive({
    m <- models()
    req(input$h > 0)
    forecast(m, h = input$h)
  })

  #---------------------------------------------------
  # Training accuracy
  #---------------------------------------------------
  train_accuracy <- reactive({
    models() |>
      accuracy() |>
      as_tibble() |>
      select(Varietal, .model, RMSE, MAE, MAPE)
  })

  #---------------------------------------------------
  # Validation accuracy
  #---------------------------------------------------
  valid_accuracy <- reactive({
    tv  <- train_validation()
    val <- tv$validation

    if (nrow(val) == 0) {
      return(
        tibble(
          Message = "No validation data in this split. Move the training end earlier."
        )
      )
    }

    m      <- models()
    fc_val <- forecast(m, new_data = val)

    accuracy(fc_val, val) |>
      as_tibble() |>
      select(Varietal, .model, RMSE, MAE, MAPE)
  })

  #---------------------------------------------------
  # Model specifications (TSLM / ETS / ARIMA)
  #---------------------------------------------------
  model_specs <- reactive({
    m <- models()

    # turn mable into a plain tibble so dplyr::select doesn't rebuild the mable
    m_tbl <- as_tibble(m)

    validate(
      need(nrow(m_tbl) > 0, "No models to summarise.")
    )

    get_spec <- function(fit) {
      tryCatch(
        {
          out  <- capture.output(report(fit))
          line <- out[grepl("^Model:", out)][1]
          if (is.na(line)) {
            "Model summary unavailable"
          } else {
            stringr::str_trim(sub("^Model:\\s*", "", line))
          }
        },
        error = function(e) "Model failed to fit"
      )
    }

    specs <- list()

    # TSLM -------------------------------------------------------
    if ("TSLM" %in% names(m_tbl)) {
      specs[[length(specs) + 1]] <-
        m_tbl |>
        dplyr::transmute(
          Varietal,
          Model = "TSLM",
          Specification = "TSLM(Sales ~ trend() + season())"
        )
    }

    # ETS --------------------------------------------------------
    if ("ETS" %in% names(m_tbl)) {
      specs[[length(specs) + 1]] <-
        m_tbl |>
        dplyr::transmute(
          Varietal,
          Model = "ETS",
          Specification = purrr::map_chr(ETS, get_spec)
        )
    }

    # ARIMA ------------------------------------------------------
    if ("ARIMA" %in% names(m_tbl)) {
      specs[[length(specs) + 1]] <-
        m_tbl |>
        dplyr::transmute(
          Varietal,
          Model = "ARIMA",
          Specification = purrr::map_chr(ARIMA, get_spec)
        )
    }

    dplyr::bind_rows(specs)
  })

  #---------------------------------------------------
  # Plots
  #---------------------------------------------------

  # Overview time-series plot
  output$ts_plot <- renderPlot({
    df <- data_filtered()

    ggplot(df, aes(Month, Sales, colour = Varietal)) +
      geom_line() +
      labs(
        x = "Month",
        y = "Sales",
        colour = "Varietal"
      ) +
      theme_minimal()
  })

  # STL decomposition for first selected varietal
  output$decomp_plot <- renderPlot({
    req(input$show_decomp)

    df        <- data_filtered()
    first_var <- sort(unique(df$Varietal))[1]

    dcmp <- df |>
      filter(Varietal == first_var) |>
      model(
        STL(Sales ~ season(window = "periodic"))
      ) |>
      components()

    autoplot(dcmp)
  })

  # Forecast comparison plot (TSLM / ETS / ARIMA)
  output$fc_plot <- renderPlot({
    df <- data_filtered()
    fc <- fc_future()

    autoplot(fc, data = df) +
      labs(
        x = "Month",
        y = "Sales",
        colour = "Model"
      ) +
      theme_minimal() +
      facet_wrap(vars(Varietal), scales = "free_y")
  })

  #---------------------------------------------------
  # Tables wired to reactives
  #---------------------------------------------------
  output$train_accuracy_table <- renderTable({
    train_accuracy()
  }, digits = 2)

  output$valid_accuracy_table <- renderTable({
    valid_accuracy()
  }, digits = 2)

  output$model_specs_table <- renderTable({
    model_specs()
  })
}

#-----------------------------------------------------------------------
# Run the app
#-----------------------------------------------------------------------
shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)

```
